snippet: Jason Brown will be chief deputy attorney general responsible for criminal prosecutions, and Janet Sabel will be chief deputy attorney general in charge of affirmative litigation.
abstract: New York Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman names Jason A Brown and Janet Sabel as chief deputy attorneys general.
lead_paragraph: Jason Brown will be chief deputy attorney general responsible for criminal prosecutions, and Janet Sabel will be chief deputy attorney general in charge of affirmative litigation.

headline.main: Attorney General of N.Y. Picks Top Deputies
headline.print_headline: Attorney General of N.Y. Picks Top Deputies
